like seriously. i trying my best to accept it, but dunno how long i can take this shit others are giving me. yes it is true that patience is a virtue, but it does run out.  for those wondering why i'm so angry, i'll tell you guys here.

it's all because of a simple problem turned complex, which is, last sunday's guard duty on 16 august. the story goes like this:

basically A was scheduled for duty. but he told our bloody sergeant (BS) he got wedding dinner that night. so BS called B, as he was the reserve, to cover. but B also got relative's wedding to attend. so he called C, he also got something planned already. finally he called me. i told him it was my birthday so i confirm cannot do it, and i even told him to let me go enjoy my birthday. so after discussing with A B C, A said if no one can do it he will do it. so B C n myself we didnt do anything else since a said he going to do it. but on the day itself, A didnt turn up and got the other 3 of us into deep shit.

so why am i angry? due to several reasons:

1) because A didnt turn up, the 4 of us ( A B C n me) must do this guard duty on 24 august as PUNISHMENT. so i asked BS why the other 3 of us got punished just because A didnt turn up, because A confirmed he was going to do the guard duty. BS said we didnt confirm with him who was doing, and last minute he had to call replacement. i told him the 3 of us dont deserved to be punished, instead just punish A la.

this is the exact sms he sent the 4 of us: "4 0f u will d0 guard duty 0n 240809, m0nday.. Plus the nxt guard duty 0n d f0ll0wg m0nth, 4 0f u will b first 0n d list. I warned u 2 settle am0ngst 4 0f u... I b fair, s0 i punished all 0f u."

yea rite. so much for ur fairness.

2) C n myself were not even in the reserve list, and he approached us to do. and because he called us, we got sucked into this whole equation for the guard duty. i asked BS how come me n C got sucked into this thing when in the first place we were not in the reserve list, much less involved. BS reason: because i called you 2 to help.

3) dont tell me i cant even be spared even though it was my birthday? cos i got this other platoon mate, he was on duty and he got 2 days off to celebrate his birthday. let me repeat, ON DUTY and GOT 2 DAYS OFF! like hello, just nice my birthday fall on my off day, so that i can go enjoy myself. lucky i didnt ask for extended off to celebrate. but die die BS want me to do guard duty. oh ya, another thing. this same platoon mate was scheduled for guard duty on tuesday nite, but he managed to "run away" and get the reserve to replace him. his reason: My fren's birthday. WAH LAO! fren's birthday wad, not your birthday. like dat oso can siam guard duty sia. WTF!

4) there was another reserve, which is our senior. but BS die die dont want to call him, saying he got funeral to attend. like real la got funeral. from wat i know, dat saturday nite (15 august) he got some event going on.

5) and now, BS twisted his words about the guard duty. this is wat he sms me: "Khai, my first intention was 2 punished f0ur 0f u. Bt when i gv the punishment, it l00ked as if everyb0dy in d plat00n buat atleast sa2 guard duty. Hpe u understand."

nonsense sia. seriously WTF! first say different thing, now say another thing.

as of now, this matter is not settled yet. i'm still very unhappy. but i'm finding ways to go settle it once and for all. confirm the office will become a war zone. i'm just gonna bomb and bomb. so wat if he is a sergeant. like i fucking care.

i have a sudden urge to blog about BSC. here it goes..

well, basically in my 3 years of poly life, i had been very much involved with BSC activities. at first, i don't even know that BSC existed, until their SL recruitment period. Valerie asked if i wanted to join as an SL, but in the end, i joined as Log Comm. this was where the fun started. i somehow 'created' the logistics commitee, cause no one else wanted to join and the other 3 are all of them are my friends. there were 2 other girls, yansiew and yuling, and this guy, fadzli, who was from my french cds class. the 4 of us were like superheroes, running everywhere in school for SL Camp and Week Zero Orientation. haha. those were the days la. and through log comm, i knew more people. people whom i spent the next 2 years in poly hanging out with almost everyday. to mention some - cheryl, samantha soh, keagan, etc. and that was the 2nd consecutive year that Business won overall Overall Champion for Week Zero!

den in year 2, i decided to run for BSC Main Comm elections. got into the Main Comm AY 06/07 with 89 votes. it wasn't that competitive last time, though. as a main comm, i had to work with the different people, with different working styles, and different attitudes. it was really a challenge. but through it all, i managed to be close to some people, like wesley, shawn, daniel goh. they are really my brudders in main comm. 1 whole year with the main comm was really fun. yes, even though there were arguments, miscommunication, misunderstandings during events, those were the things that bonded us and brought us even closer to one another. i know that the main comms screwed things up during Week Zero, but the fact that we won Overall Champion for the 3rd consecutive year, somehow managed to ease the pain of screwing things up. how i wish i could turn back time to when i was in year 2. and that year, i got to know some more people like kengkee, kannan, etc.
